title: Impossibile autenticarsi - Account Libero
content: Buongiorno, nonostante impostazioni e password siano corretti continua a darmi questo errore. Accedendo dal browser infatti è tutto ok! Attendo un vostro aiuto! Grazie
creator: g.aulicino81

title: Mail folder - Multiple Accounts - Size > 100GB
content: My computer crashed and I had to reinstall Thunderbird. Luckily I had a backup and so did not lose any of my mails. I now have all my mail accounts (2) and all my mails in their folders. However, my profile folder size is more than 100GB. When I looked into the Mail Subfolder in my profile folder, I found two folders for every account as per attached screen shot. What have I don't wrong. Why are there two folders for every email account. Please help!
creator: jkarnani

title: e mails problems
content: Please can you help us, We have used thunderbird for many years. It updates automatically. We are sending email out to all different addresses, they are being received. However if we send an e mail to a G mail account it goes out and shows it gone but it does not reach the the g mail account . This is not just one person. this multiple g amil accounts. Our internet provider claims it is thunderbirds fault. Hope someone can help. John
creator: john922

title: connessione al server imapmail fuori tempo massimo
content: Buon giorno dopo giorni di blocco della posta di libero, cui è collegato thunerbird, ora che la mail di libero è accessibile non riesco a collegarla a thunerbird. Esce il messaggio "connessione al server imapmail fuori tempo massimo". Grazie Fabia Gemmo
creator: gemmo.fabia

title: scaricamento posta da Libero
content: Oggi hanno ripristinato libero mail, ma non riesco a scaricare la posta arrivata tramite thunderbird. Potete aiutarmi? Devo cambiare qualcosa nei parametri? Grazie
creator: nicoletta.martinengo

title: Problemi configurazione posta virgilio su Thunderbird
content:
Buongiorno, recentemente la posta elettronica di Virgilio e Libero è andata in down per 3 giorni e non mi faceva accedere sia sul sito di posta elettronica e anche su Mozilla Thunderbird.

Adesso sia Virgilio che Libero sono tornati attivi ma quando provo a fare l'accesso su Thunderbird non mi accede.

Ho provato a modificare le impostazioni del server ma niente, avete delle soluzioni alternative?


Saluti
creator: ufficiostiletorredg

title: I can't recieve or send out email even though nothing was changed
content: get my thunderbird email working again please it's over a year now and none of the read suggestions work.
creator: walter53a

title: Wayland:  wl_surface@43: error 2: Buffer size is not divisible by scale (2)
content:
Since this commmit wlroots starts sending back WL_SURFACE_ERROR_INVALID_SIZE instead of a warning.

Actual error message on stderr: Crash Annotation GraphicsCriticalError: |[0][GFX1-]: Wayland protocol error: wl_surface@43: error 2: Buffer size (777x943) is not divisible by scale (2) 

(t=8.94709) [GFX1-]: Wayland protocol error: wl_surface@43: error 2: Buffer size (777x943) is not divisible by scale (2)

Other related issues: https://github.com/swaywm/sway/issues/7398#issuecomment-1403388390 https://github.com/obsproject/obs-studio/issues/8674 https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1409940

Seems like it is up to application to resolve this issue.
creator: hftsai256
